verses.verse: Adam <WH121>, Seth<WH8352>, Enosh<WH583>,
Kenan <WH7018>, Mahalalel<WH4111>, Jared<WH3382>,
Enoch <WH2585>, Methuselah<WH4968>, Lamech<WH3929>,
Noah <WH5146>, Shem<WH8035>, Ham<WH2526>, and Japheth<WH3315>.
The sons<WH1121> of Japheth<WH3315>: Gomer<WH1586>, and Magog<WH4031>, and Madai<WH4074>, and Javan<WH3120>, and Tubal<WH8422>, and Meshech<WH4902>, and Tiras<WH8494>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Gomer<WH1586>: Ashkenaz<WH813>, and Diphath<WH7384>, and Togarmah<WH8425>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Javan<WH3120>: Elishah<WH473>, and Tarshish<WH8659>, Kittim<WH3794>, and Rodanim<WH1721>.
The sons<WH1121> of Ham<WH2526>: Cush<WH3568>, and Mizraim<WH4714>, Put<WH6316>, and Canaan<WH3667>.

And the sons<WH1121> of Cush<WH3568>: Seba<WH5434>, and Havilah<WH2341>, and Sabta<WH5454>, and Raama<WH7484>, and Sabteca<WH5455>. And the sons<WH1121> of Raamah<WH7484>: Sheba<WH7614>, and Dedan<WH1719>.
And Cush<WH3568> begat<WH3205> Nimrod<WH5248>; he began<WH2490> to be a mighty<WH1368> one in the earth<WH776>.
And Mizraim<WH4714> begat<WH3205> Ludim<WH3866>, and Anamim<WH6047>, and Lehabim<WH3853>, and Naphtuhim<WH5320>,
and Pathrusim<WH6625>, and Casluhim<WH3695> (from whence came<WH3318> the Philistines<WH6430>), and Caphtorim<WH3732>.
And Canaan<WH3667> begat<WH3205> Sidon<WH6721> his first-born<WH1060>, and Heth<WH2845>,
and the Jebusite<WH2983>, and the Amorite<WH567>, and the Girgashite<WH1622>,
and the Hivite<WH2340>, and the Arkite<WH6208>, and the Sinite<WH5513>,
and the Arvadite<WH721>, and the Zemarite<WH6786>, and the Hamathite<WH2577>.
The sons<WH1121> of Shem<WH8035>: Elam<WH5867>, and Asshur<WH804>, and Arpachshad<WH775>, and Lud<WH3865>, and Aram<WH758>, and Uz<WH5780>, and Hul<WH2343>, and Gether<WH1666>, and Meshech<WH4902>.
And Arpachshad<WH775> begat<WH3205> Shelah<WH7974>, and Shelah<WH7974> begat<WH3205> Eber<WH5677>.

And unto Eber<WH5677> were born<WH3205> two<WH8147> sons<WH1121>: the name<WH8034> of the one<WH259> was Peleg<WH6389>; for in his days<WH3117> the earth<WH776> was divided<WH6385>; and his brother<WH251>'s name<WH8034> was Joktan<WH3355>.
And Joktan<WH3355> begat<WH3205> Almodad<WH486>, and Sheleph<WH8026>, and Hazarmaveth<WH2700>, and Jerah<WH3392>,
and Hadoram<WH1913>, and Uzal<WH187>, and Diklah<WH1853>,
and Ebal<WH5858>, and Abimael<WH39>, and Sheba<WH7614>,
and Ophir<WH211>, and Havilah<WH2341>, and Jobab<WH3103>. All these were the sons<WH1121> of Joktan<WH3355>.
Shem <WH8035>, Arpachshad<WH775>, Shelah<WH7974>,
Eber <WH5677>, Peleg<WH6389>, Reu<WH7466>,
Serug <WH8286>, Nahor<WH5152>, Terah<WH8646>,
Abram <WH87> (the same is Abraham<WH85>).
The sons<WH1121> of Abraham<WH85>: Isaac<WH3327>, and Ishmael<WH3458>.
These are their generations<WH8435>: the first-born<WH1060> of Ishmael<WH3458>, Nebaioth<WH5032>; then Kedar<WH6938>, and Adbeel<WH110>, and Mibsam<WH4017>,
Mishma <WH4927>, and Dumah<WH1746>, Massa<WH4854>, Hadad<WH2301>, and Tema<WH8485>,
Jetur <WH3195>, Naphish<WH5305>, and Kedemah<WH6929>. These are the sons<WH1121> of Ishmael<WH3458>.

And the sons<WH1121> of Keturah<WH6989>, Abraham<WH85>'s concubine<WH6370>: she bare<WH3205> Zimran<WH2175>, and Jokshan<WH3370>, and Medan<WH4091>, and Midian<WH4080>, and Ishbak<WH3435>, and Shuah<WH7744>. And the sons<WH1121> of Jokshan<WH3370>: Sheba<WH7614>, and Dedan<WH1719>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Midian<WH4080>: Ephah<WH5891>, and Epher<WH6081>, and Hanoch<WH2585>, and Abida<WH28>, and Eldaah<WH420>. All these were the sons<WH1121> of Keturah<WH6989>.
And Abraham<WH85> begat<WH3205> Isaac<WH3327>. The sons<WH1121> of Isaac<WH3327>: Esau<WH6215>, and Israel<WH3478>.
The sons<WH1121> of Esau<WH6215>: Eliphaz<WH464>, Reuel<WH7467>, and Jeush<WH3266>, and Jalam<WH3281>, and Korah<WH7141>.
The sons<WH1121> of Eliphaz<WH464>: Teman<WH8487>, and Omar<WH201>, Zephi<WH6825>, and Gatam<WH1609>, Kenaz<WH7073>, and Timna<WH8555>, and Amalek<WH6002>.
The sons<WH1121> of Reuel<WH7467>: Nahath<WH5184>, Zerah<WH2226>, Shammah<WH8048>, and Mizzah<WH4199>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Seir<WH8165>: Lotan<WH3877>, and Shobal<WH7732>, and Zibeon<WH6649>, and Anah<WH6034>, and Dishon<WH1787>, and Ezer<WH687>, and Dishan<WH1789>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Lotan<WH3877>: Hori<WH2753>, and Homam<WH1950>; and Timna<WH8555> was Lotan<WH3877>'s sister<WH269>.
The sons<WH1121> of Shobal<WH7732>: Alian<WH5935>, and Manahath<WH4506>, and Ebal<WH5858>, Shephi<WH8195>, and Onam<WH208>. And the sons<WH1121> of Zibeon<WH6649>: Aiah<WH345>, and Anah<WH6034>.
The sons<WH1121> of Anah<WH6034>: Dishon<WH1787>. And the sons<WH1121> of Dishon<WH1787>: Hamran<WH2566>, and Eshban<WH790>, and Ithran<WH3506>, and Cheran<WH3763>.
The sons<WH1121> of Ezer<WH687>: Bilhan<WH1092>, and Zaavan<WH2190>, Jaakan<WH3292>. The sons<WH1121> of Dishan<WH1789>: Uz<WH5780>, and Aran<WH765>.

Now these are the kings<WH4428> that reigned<WH4427> in the land<WH776> of Edom<WH123>, before<WH6440> there reigned<WH4427> any king<WH4428> over the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>: Bela<WH1106> the son<WH1121> of Beor<WH1160>; and the name<WH8034> of his city<WH5892> was Dinhabah<WH1838>.
And Bela<WH1106> died<WH4191>, and Jobab<WH3103> the son<WH1121> of Zerah<WH2226> of Bozrah<WH1224> reigned in his stead<WH4427>.
And Jobab<WH3103> died<WH4191>, and Husham<WH2367> of the land<WH776> of the Temanites<WH8489> reigned in his stead<WH4427>.

And Husham<WH2367> died<WH4191>, and Hadad<WH1908> the son<WH1121> of Bedad<WH911>, who smote<WH5221> Midian<WH4080> in the field<WH7704> of Moab<WH4124>, reigned<WH4427> in his stead<WH8034>; and the name of his city<WH5892> was Avith<WH5762>.
And Hadad<WH1908> died<WH4191>, and Samlah<WH8072> of Masrekah<WH4957> reigned in his stead<WH4427>.
And Samlah<WH8072> died<WH4191>, and Shaul<WH7586> of Rehoboth<WH7344> by the River<WH5104> reigned in his stead<WH4427>.
And Shaul<WH7586> died<WH4191>, and Baal-hanan<WH1177> the son<WH1121> of Achbor<WH5907> reigned in his stead<WH4427>.

And Baal-hanan<WH1177> died<WH4191>, and Hadad<WH1908> reigned<WH4427> in his stead<WH8034>; and the name of his city<WH5892> was Pai<WH6464>: and his wife<WH802>'s name<WH8034> was Mehetabel<WH4105>, the daughter<WH1323> of Matred<WH4308>, the daughter<WH1323> of Me-zahab<WH4314>.
And Hadad<WH1908> died<WH4191>. And the chiefs<WH441> of Edom<WH123> were<WH441>: chief Timna<WH8555>, chief<WH441> Aliah<WH5933>, chief<WH441> Jetheth<WH3509>,
chief <WH441> Oholibamah<WH173>, chief<WH441> Elah<WH425>, chief<WH441> Pinon<WH6373>,
chief <WH441> Kenaz<WH7073>, chief<WH441> Teman<WH8487>, chief<WH441> Mibzar<WH4014>,
chief <WH441> Magdiel<WH4025>, chief<WH441> Iram<WH5902>. These are the chiefs<WH441> of Edom<WH123>.
